recipe.ingredients: - mixed berries (frozen): 4 cups (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries) - lemon juice: 2 tablespoons - water: 1/2 cup - erythritol: 1/4 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Ensure the mixed berries are frozen and ready to use. 2. Blend: In a blender or food processor, combine the frozen mixed berries, lemon juice, water, and erythritol. Blend until the mixture is smooth. 3. Freeze: Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions. If you do not have an ice cream maker, you can place it in a container and freeze, stirring every 30 minutes until frozen and smooth. 4. Serve or Store: Serve immediately for a softer texture or freeze for at least 2 hours for a firmer sorbet. Store in an airtight container in the freezer.
